text:
suggestion:

Extend the delete page with something like

<<If you need to compare a set of source files with a set of target files and
any of the source files that are more recent than any of the target files, all
of the target files need to be removed see the "dependset"
(http://jakarta.apache.org/ant/manual/CoreTasks/dependset.html) task.>>

Furthermore, a hint like <<If you need yet other sophisticated file-grouping,
see the selectors (http://jakarta.apache.org/ant/manual/CoreTypes/selectors.html).>>
creator: hauser@acm.org
bodewig@apache.org
text:
dependset seems to have stayed a pretty obscure task, people seem to prefer things like ant-contrib's outofdate.  I fails to see the direct connect to the delete task.

selectors are pretty standard nowadays and don't need further links IMHO.
